name: Inaris "Ventura" Knife
description: Grants immunity to normal wounds while held, making it a useful tool when fighting severalwolvessimultaneously. Does not preventDeep Wounds. UnlikeThrowing Knives, the Inaris "Ventura" Knife cannot be thrown. There currently are no Workshop throwing knives.
